description: Enforce authentication and role-based access control on the container service to restrict users to the least privileges required.(Citation: Kubernetes Hardening Guide) When using Kubernetes, avoid giving users wildcard permissions or adding users to the `system:masters` group, and use `RoleBindings` rather than `ClusterRoleBindings` to limit user privileges to specific namespaces.(Citation: Kubernetes RBAC)

external_references.description: Kubernetes. (n.d.). Role Based Access Control Good Practices. Retrieved March 8, 2023.
